summary.span: 表示控制台应用程序的标准输入流、输出流和错误流。

span.span: Represents the standard input, output, and error streams for console applications.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制台是一个操作系统窗口，其中用户交互与操作系统或基于文本的控制台应用程序通过输入通过计算机键盘的文本输入并从计算机终端阅读的文本输出。The console is an operating system window where users interact with the operating system or with a text-based console application by entering text input through the computer keyboard, and by reading text output from the computer terminal. 例如，在 Windows 操作系统，在控制台称为命令提示符窗口，接受 MS-DOS 命令。For example, in the Windows operating system, the console is called the Command Prompt window and accepts MS-DOS commands. 类提供基本支持的应用程序读取字符，并向控制台写入字符。The class provides basic support for applications that read characters from, and write characters to, the console. 了解如何使用开发类，请参阅以下各节：For information about developing with the class, see the following sections: - [控制台 I/O 流Console I/O Streams](#Streams) - [屏幕缓冲区和控制台窗口Screen Buffer and Console Window](#Buffer) - [在控制台的 Unicode 支持Unicode Support for the Console](#Unicode) - [常见的操作Common Operations](#Operations) - [.NET core 说明.NET Core Notes](#Core) ## 控制台 I/O 流Console I/O Streams 控制台应用程序启动时，操作系统会自动将关联三个 I/O 流与控制台： 标准输入流、 标准输出流和标准错误输出流。When a console application starts, the operating system automatically associates three I/O streams with the console: standard input stream, standard output stream, and standard error output stream. 应用程序可以从标准输入流; 读取用户输入正常的数据写入标准输出流;并将错误数据写入到标准错误输出流。Your application can read user input from the standard input stream; write normal data to the standard output stream; and write error data to the standard error output stream. 这些流将提供给应用程序的值作为， ，和属性。These streams are presented to your application as the values of the , , and properties. 默认情况下的值属性是对象，它表示键盘和的值并属性是表示控制台窗口的对象。By default, the value of the property is a object that represents the keyboard, and the values of the and properties are objects that represent a console window. 但是，可以将这些属性设置为不表示控制台窗口或键盘; 的流例如，可以为流，以便代表文件来设置这些属性。However, you can set these properties to streams that do not represent the console window or keyboard; for example, you can set these properties to streams that represent files. 若要将标准输入、 标准输出或标准错误流重定向，请调用， ，或方法，分别。To redirect the standard input, standard output, or standard error stream, call the , , or method, respectively. 使用这些流的 I/O 操作保持同步，这意味着多个线程可以读取或写入流。I/O operations that use these streams are synchronized, which means that multiple threads can read from, or write to, the streams. 这意味着，方法是通常异步的如，如果该对象表示控制台流以同步方式执行。This means that methods that are ordinarily asynchronous, such as , execute synchronously if the object represents a console stream. > [!NOTE] > 不要使用类，以在无人参与的应用程序，如服务器应用程序中显示输出。Do not use the class to display output in unattended applications, such as server applications. 调用方法如和GUI 应用程序中产生任何影响。Calls to methods such as and have no effect in GUI applications. 类成员能够正常工作，当基础流定向到控制台时可能引发异常，如果流重定向，例如，到一个文件。 class members that work normally when the underlying stream is directed to a console might throw an exception if the stream is redirected, for example, to a file. 在应用程序中捕获重定向标准流的异常。Program your application to catch exceptions if you redirect a standard stream. 此外可以使用， ，并的属性以确定是否一个标准流重定向之前执行的操作将引发异常。You can also use the , , and properties to determine whether a standard stream is redirected before performing an operation that throws an exception. 有时还是需要显式调用流对象所表示的成员， ，和属性。It is sometimes useful to explicitly call the members of the stream objects represented by the , , and properties. 例如，默认情况下，方法从标准输入流读取输入。For example, by default, the method reads input from the standard input stream. 同样，方法将数据写入到标准输出流和数据后跟默认行终止字符串，它是回车符和换行符 ("\r\n")。Similarly, the method writes data to the standard output stream, and the data is followed by the default line termination string, which is a carriage return and line feed ("\r\n"). 但是，类不提供相应的方法将数据写入到标准错误输出流或要更改写入该流的数据的行终止字符串的属性。However, the class does not provide a corresponding method to write data to the standard error output stream, or a property to change the line termination string for data written to that stream. 您可以通过设置来解决此问题的属性或到另一个行终止字符串的属性。You can solve this problem by setting the property of the or property to another line termination string. 例如，下面的 C# 语句将标准错误输出流的行终止字符串设置为两个回车符和换行符的序列：For example, the following C# statement sets the line termination string for the standard error output stream to two carriage return and line feed sequences: `Console.Error.NewLine = "\r\n\r\n";` 然后，可以显式调用方法的错误输出流对象，如下面的 C# 语句中所示：You can then explicitly call the method of the error output stream object, as in the following C# statement: `Console.Error.WriteLine();` ## 屏幕缓冲区和控制台窗口Screen Buffer and Console Window 在控制台的两个密切相关的功能是屏幕缓冲区，并在控制台窗口。Two closely related features of the console are the screen buffer and the console window. 文本实际读取或写入到流所拥有的控制台中，但似乎无法读取或写入归调用屏幕缓冲区的控制台的区域。Text is actually read from or written to streams owned by the console, but appear to be read from or written to an area owned by the console called the screen buffer. 屏幕缓冲区是在控制台中，一个属性，并为矩形网格行和列的每个网格相交或字符单元格，其中包含一个字符的组织。The screen buffer is an attribute of the console, and is organized as a rectangular grid of rows and columns where each grid intersection, or character cell, can contain a character. 每个字符具有其自己的前景颜色，并且每个字符单元格具有它自己的背景色。Each character has its own foreground color, and each character cell has its own background color. 通过调用控制台窗口的矩形区域查看屏幕缓冲区。The screen buffer is viewed through a rectangular region called the console window. 在控制台窗口是在控制台中; 另一个属性它不是本身，它是操作系统窗口的控制台。The console window is another attribute of the console; it is not the console itself, which is an operating system window. 控制台窗口按行和列排列、 小于或等于屏幕缓冲区的大小并可通过移动来查看不同区域的基础屏幕缓冲区。The console window is arranged in rows and columns, is less than or equal to the size of the screen buffer, and can be moved to view different areas of the underlying screen buffer. 如果大于控制台窗口屏幕缓冲区，控制台将自动显示滚动条使屏幕缓冲区区域上方可重新定位在控制台窗口。If the screen buffer is larger than the console window, the console automatically displays scroll bars so the console window can be repositioned over the screen buffer area. 游标指示文本的当前读取或写入的屏幕缓冲区位置。A cursor indicates the screen buffer position where text is currently read or written. 游标可以隐藏或可见，并且可以更改窗体的高度。The cursor can be hidden or made visible, and its height can be changed. 如果光标可见，因此游标都在视图中的控制台窗口位置是自动移动。If the cursor is visible, the console window position is moved automatically so the cursor is always in view. 屏幕缓冲区中的字符单元坐标的源是左上角，并以相对于该源来度量的光标和控制台窗口的位置。The origin for character cell coordinates in the screen buffer is the upper left corner, and the positions of the cursor and the console window are measured relative to that origin. 使用从零开始的索引指定的位置;也就是说，指定为第 0，行和第 0 列的最左侧列的最顶部的行。Use zero-based indexes to specify positions; that is, specify the topmost row as row 0, and the leftmost column as column 0. 行和列索引的最大值是。The maximum value for the row and column indexes is . ## 在控制台的 Unicode 支持Unicode Support for the Console 一般情况下，在控制台读取输入，并将输出写通过使用系统区域设置定义默认情况下的当前控制台代码页。In general, the console reads input and writes output by using the current console code page, which the system locale defines by default. 代码页可以处理提供的 Unicode 字符的一个子集，因此如果您尝试对未映射的特定代码页，在控制台显示字符将无法显示所有字符或准确地表示它们。A code page can handle only a subset of available Unicode characters, so if you try to display characters that are not mapped by a particular code page, the console won't be able to display all characters or represent them accurately. 以下示例阐释了此问题。The following example illustrates this problem. 它会向控制台显示到 U + 044F 从 U + 0410年西里尔字母的字符。It tries to display the characters of the Cyrillic alphabet from U+0410 to U+044F to the console. 如果使用控制台代码页 437 的系统上运行示例，每个字符将替换为问号 （？），因为西里尔语字符不会映射到代码页 437 中的字符。If you run the example on a system that uses console code page 437, each character is replaced by a question mark (?), because Cyrillic characters do not map to the characters in code page 437. [!code-csharp[System.Console.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.class/cs/unicode1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Console.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.class/vb/unicode1.vb#1)] 除了支持代码页类支持 utf-8 编码与类。In addition to supporting code pages, the class supports UTF-8 encoding with the class. 从.NET Framework 4.5，开始类还支持 UTF 16 编码与类。Beginning with the .NET Framework 4.5, the class also supports UTF-16 encoding with the class. 若要向控制台显示 Unicode 字符。To display Unicode characters to the console. 您设置属性设置为任一或。you set the property to either or . 对 Unicode 字符的支持需要编码器，以识别特定的 Unicode 字符，并且还需要具有呈现该字符所需的标志符号的字体。Support for Unicode characters requires the encoder to recognize a particular Unicode character, and also requires a font that has the glyphs needed to render that character. 若要成功地向控制台显示 Unicode 字符，控制台字体必须设置为非光栅或如 Consolas 或 Lucida Console TrueType 字体。To successfully display Unicode characters to the console, the console font must be set to a non-raster or TrueType font such as Consolas or Lucida Console. 下面的示例演示如何以编程方式更改字体从光栅字体到 Lucida Console。The following example shows how you can programmatically change the font from a raster font to Lucida Console. [!code-csharp[System.Console.Class.Unsafe#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.class.unsafe/cs/setfont1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Console.Class.Unsafe#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.class.unsafe/vb/setfont1.vb#3)] 但是，TrueType 字体可以显示标志符号的一个子集。However, TrueType fonts can display only a subset of glyphs. 例如，Lucida Console 字体显示仅 643 的从 u+0021 到 U + FB02 大约 64,000 可用字符。For example, the Lucida Console font displays only 643 of the approximately 64,000 available characters from U+0021 to U+FB02. 若要查看的字符对特定字体支持，请打开**字体**小程序控制面板中，选择**查找字符**选项，然后选择中要检查其字符集的字体**字体**的列表**字符映射表**窗口。To see which characters a particular font supports, open the **Fonts** applet in Control Panel, choose the **Find a character** option, and choose the font whose character set you'd like to examine in the **Font** list of the **Character Map** window. Windows 使用字体链接来显示不能在特定字体的标志符号。Windows uses font linking to display glyphs that are not available in a particular font. 字体链接以显示其他字符集的信息，请参阅[循序渐进全球化：字体](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=229111)。For information about font linking to display additional character sets, see [Globalization Step-by-Step: Fonts](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=229111). 链接的字体是在注册表的 HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\FontLink\SystemLink 子项中定义的。Linked fonts are defined in the HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\FontLink\SystemLink subkey of the registry. 此子项与关联的每个条目对应于基础字体的名称，其值为字符串数组，用于定义字体文件并链接到基础字体的字体。Each entry associated with this subkey corresponds to the name of a base font, and its value is a string array that defines the font files and the fonts that are linked to the base font. 数组的每个成员定义的链接的字体并将窗体*字体文件名*，*字体名称*。Each member of the array defines a linked font and takes the form *font-file-name*,*font-name*. 下面的示例演示如何以编程方式定义名为 SimSun 名为 simsun.ttc 显示简化汉字字符的字体文件中找到的链接的字体。The following example illustrates how you can programmatically define a linked font named SimSun found in a font file named simsun.ttc that displays Simplified Han characters. [!code-csharp[System.Console.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.class/cs/fontlink1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Console.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.class/vb/fontlink1.vb#2)] 在控制台的 Unicode 支持具有以下限制：Unicode support for the console has the following limitations: - 不支持 UTF-32 编码。UTF-32 encoding is not supported. 唯一受支持的 Unicode 编码为 utf-8 和 utf-16，由和类，分别。The only supported Unicode encodings are UTF-8 and UTF-16, which are represented by the and classes, respectively. - 不支持双向输出。Bidirectional output is not supported. - 显示基本多文种平面之外的字符 (即，代理项对) 不支持，即使它们链接的字体文件中定义。Display of characters outside the Basic Multilingual Plane (that is, of surrogate pairs) is not supported, even if they are defined in a linked font file. - 不支持复杂脚本中的字符显示。Display of characters in complex scripts is not supported. - 组合字符序列 （即，基字符和一个或多个组合字符组成的字符） 显示为单独的字符。Combining character sequences (that is, characters that consist of a base character and one or more combining characters) are displayed as separate characters. 若要解决此限制，可以将规范化的字符串来显示通过调用方法，然后再将输出发送到控制台。To work around this limitation, you can normalize the string to be displayed by calling the method before sending output to the console. 在以下示例中，一个字符串，包含组合字符序列 U + 0061 为两个字符之前输出字符串进行规范化，并作为单个字符后，向控制台显示 U + 0308年调用方法。In the following example, a string that contains the combining character sequence U+0061 U+0308 is displayed to the console as two characters before the output string is normalized, and as a single character after the method is called. [!code-csharp[System.Console.Class#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.class/cs/normalize1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Console.Class#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.class/vb/normalize1.vb#5)] 请注意规范化是可行的解决方案，仅当字符包括预先构成的窗体对应于特定 combining 标准的 Unicode 字符序列。Note that normalization is a viable solution only if the Unicode standard for the character includes a pre-composed form that corresponds to a particular combining character sequence. - 如果字体为专用区域中的代码点提供了一个标志符号，将显示该标志符号。If a font provides a glyph for a code point in the private use area, that glyph will be displayed. 但是，由于专用区域中的字符是特定于应用程序，这可能不是预期的标志符号。However, because characters in the private use area are application-specific, this may not be the expected glyph. 下面的示例向控制台显示一系列的 Unicode 字符。The following example displays a range of Unicode characters to the console. 该示例接受三个命令行参数： 要显示到显示，以及是否使用当前控制台编码范围末尾的范围的开始 (`false`) 或 utf-16 编码 (`true`)。The example accepts three command-line parameters: the start of the range to display, the end of the range to display, and whether to use the current console encoding (`false`) or UTF-16 encoding (`true`). 它假定控制台使用 TrueType 字体。It assumes that the console is using a TrueType font. [!code-csharp[System.Console.Class#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.class/cs/example3.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Console.Class#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.class/vb/example3.vb#4)] ## 常见的操作Common Operations 类包含用于读取控制台输入和写入控制台输出的以下方法：The class contains the following methods for reading console input and writing console output: - 重载方法读取单个字符。The overloads of the method read an individual character. - 方法读取输入一整行。The method reads an entire line of input. - 方法重载将值类型、 字符、 数组或一组对象的实例转换为格式化或非格式化字符串，然后将该字符串写入到控制台。The method overloads convert an instance of a value type, an array of characters, or a set of objects to a formatted or unformatted string, and then write that string to the console. - 并行的设置方法重载相同字符串作为输出重载，但还将添加一个行终止字符串。A parallel set of method overloads output the same string as the overloads but also add a line termination string. 类还包含方法和属性来执行以下操作：The class also contains methods and properties to perform the following operations: - 获取或设置屏幕缓冲区的大小。Get or set the size of the screen buffer. 并属性可以获取或设置缓冲区的高度和宽度，分别和方法可让你在单个方法调用中设置缓冲区大小。The and properties let you get or set the buffer height and width, respectively, and the method lets you set the buffer size in a single method call. - 获取或设置控制台窗口的大小。Get or set the size of the console window. 并属性可以获取或设置窗口的高度和宽度，分别和方法可让你在单个方法调用中设置的窗口大小。The and properties let you get or set the window height and width, respectively, and the method lets you set the window size in a single method call. - 获取或设置光标的大小。Get or set the size of the cursor. 属性指定的游标的高度以字符单元格。The property specifies the height of the cursor in a character cell. - 获取或设置控制台窗口相对于屏幕缓冲区的位置。Get or set the position of the console window relative to the screen buffer. 并属性可以获取或设置顶部行并显示在控制台窗口中，屏幕缓冲区的最左侧的列和方法可让你在单个方法调用中设置这些值。The and properties let you get or set the top row and leftmost column of the screen buffer that appears in the console window, and the method lets you set these values in a single method call. - 获取或设置通过获取或设置光标的位置并属性或一组通过调用光标的位置方法。Get or set the position of the cursor by getting or setting the and properties, or set the position of the cursor by calling the method. - 移动或通过调用清除屏幕缓冲区中的数据或方法。Move or clear data in the screen buffer by calling the or method. - 获取或设置使用的前景色和背景色并属性，或重置前景色和背景为其默认颜色由调用方法。Get or set the foreground and background colors by using the and properties, or reset the background and foreground to their default colors by calling the method. - 通过调用播放提示音通过控制台扬声器的声音方法。Play the sound of a beep through the console speaker by calling the method. ## [!INCLUDE[net_core](~/includes/net-core-md.md)] 说明Notes 在.NET Framework 在桌面上类使用返回的编码`GetConsoleCP`和`GetConsoleOutputCP`，这通常代码页编码。In the .NET Framework on the desktop, the class uses the encoding returned by `GetConsoleCP` and `GetConsoleOutputCP`, which typically is a code page encoding. 有关示例代码中的，系统区域性为英语 （美国） 代码页 437 上是默认情况下使用的编码。For example code, on systems whose culture is English (United States), code page 437 is the encoding that is used by default. 但是，[!INCLUDE[net_core](~/includes/net-core-md.md)]可能会使仅这些编码的受限子网可用。However, [!INCLUDE[net_core](~/includes/net-core-md.md)] may make only a limited subset of these encodings available. 这种情况，用作控制台的默认编码。Where this is the case, is used as the default encoding for the console. 如果您的应用程序依赖于特定代码页编码，您仍然可以它们可通过执行以下*之前*调用任何方法：If your app depends on specific code page encodings, you can still make them available by doing the following *before* you call any methods: 1. 将 System.Text.Encoding.CodePages.dll 程序集的引用添加到你的项目。Add a reference to the System.Text.Encoding.CodePages.dll assembly to your project. 2. 检索对象从属性。Retrieve the object from the property. 3. 传递对象传递给方法，使其他可用的编码提供程序支持的编码。Pass the object to the method to make the additional encodings supported by the encoding provider available. 类将自动使用默认系统编码而不 UTF8，前提是你在任何调用之前注册编码提供程序输出方法。The class will then automatically use the default system encoding rather than UTF8, provided that you have registered the encoding provider before calling any output methods. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何读取数据，并将数据写入到标准输入和输出流。The following example demonstrates how to read data from, and write data to, the standard input and output streams. 请注意，可以通过使用这些流将重定向和方法。Note that these streams can be redirected by using the and methods. [!code-cpp[Classic Console Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Console Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Console Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Console Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Console Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Console Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: This type is thread safe.

MemberSignature.Value: public static ConsoleColor BackgroundColor { get; set; }
.property valuetype System.ConsoleColor BackgroundColor
Public Shared Property BackgroundColor As ConsoleColor
public: static property ConsoleColor BackgroundColor { ConsoleColor get(); void set(ConsoleColor value); };
member this.BackgroundColor : ConsoleColor with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置控制台的背景色。

span.span: Gets or sets the background color of the console.

value.span: 一个值，指定控制台的背景色；也就是显示在每个字符后面的颜色。

span.span: A value that specifies the background color of the console; that is, the color that appears behind each character.

value.span: 默认为黑色。

span.span: The default is black.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对更改属性会影响仅写入到单个字符单元格的背景色更改后的输出。A change to the property affects only output that is written to individual character cells after the background color is changed. 若要更改控制台窗口中作为一个整体的背景色，请设置属性并调用方法。To change the background color of the console window as a whole, set the property and call the method. 下面的示例进行了这方面的演示。The following example provides an illustration. [!code-csharp[System.Console.BackgroundColor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.backgroundcolor/cs/backgroundcolor1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Console.BackgroundColor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.backgroundcolor/vb/backgroundcolor1.vb#1)] 对于基于 Windows 的应用程序，在其中一个控制台不存在，get 操作返回。A get operation for a Windows-based application, in which a console does not exist, returns . ## Examples 以下示例将保存的值到一个数组的枚举，并将存储的当前值和变量的属性。The following example saves the values of the enumeration to an array and stores the current values of the and properties to variables. 然后的前景色更改为在每个颜色枚举只匹配当前背景的颜色和背景色更改为在每个颜色除枚举到匹配的颜色当前前景色。It then changes the foreground color to each color in the enumeration except to the color that matches the current background, and it changes the background color to each color in the enumeration except to the color that matches the current foreground. （如果的前景色与背景色相同，文本不可见。）最后，调用方法还原原始的控制台颜色。(If the foreground color is the same as the background color, the text isn't visible.) Finally, it calls the method to restore the original console colors. summary.span: 通过控制台扬声器播放提示音。

span.span: Plays the sound of a beep through the console speaker.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，播放提示音 800 赫兹的频率的持续时间为 200 毫秒。By default, the beep plays at a frequency of 800 hertz for a duration of 200 milliseconds. > [!NOTE] > 方法不支持在 64 位版本的 Windows Vista 和 Windows XP 上。The method is not supported on the 64-bit editions of Windows Vista and Windows XP. 包装对 Windows 的调用[发出提示音函数](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms679277.aspx)。 wraps a call to the Windows [Beep function](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms679277.aspx). 是否在 Windows 7 取决于是否存在 8254 可编程间隔计时器芯片前生成的 Windows 版本上的声音。Whether produces a sound on versions of Windows before Windows 7 depends on the presence of a 8254 programmable interval timer chip. 从 Windows 7 开始，则依赖于默认声音设备。Starting with Windows 7, it depends on the default sound device. ## Examples 下面的示例演示方法。The following example demonstrates the method. 该示例接受一个介于 1 到 9 作为命令行参数，并播放提示音的次数。The example accepts a number from 1 through 9 as a command line argument, and plays the beep that number of times. [!code-cpp[console.beep#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.beep/CPP/beep.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[console.beep#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.beep/CS/beep.cs#1)] [!code-vb[console.beep#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.beep/VB/beep.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置缓冲区的高度。

span.span: Gets or sets the height of the buffer area.

value.span: 缓冲区的当前高度，以行为单位。

span.span: The current height, in rows, of the buffer area.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性定义的行 （或行），它由控制台模式窗口访问缓冲区中存储的数。This property defines the number of rows (or lines) stored in the buffer that is accessed by a console mode window. 与此相反，属性定义在任何特定时间实际在控制台窗口中显示的行数。In contrast, the property defines the number of rows that are actually displayed in the console window at any particular time. 如果实际写入到缓冲区的行数超出定义的行数属性，以便该控件显示的行相当于连续编号可以垂直滚动窗口属性，也位于任意位置在缓冲区中。If the number of rows actually written to the buffer exceeds the number of rows defined by the property, the window can be scrolled vertically so that it displays a contiguous number of rows that are equal to the property and are located anywhere in the buffer. 如果设置操作中的值减少属性，将删除最高的行。If a set operation decreases the value of the property, the uppermost lines are removed. 例如，如果行数从 300 减少到 250，行 0 到 49 被删除，而现有行 50 到 299 成为行，0 到 249。For example, if the number of lines is reduced from 300 to 250, lines 0 through 49 are removed, and the existing lines 50 through 299 become lines 0 through 249. ## Examples 此示例演示和属性。This example demonstrates the and properties. 该示例会报告操作系统窗口设置为 300 行和 85 列的缓冲区大小的尺寸。The example reports the dimensions of an operating system window set to a buffer size of 300 rows and 85 columns. [!code-cpp[console.bufferHW#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.bufferHW/CPP/hw.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[console.bufferHW#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.bufferHW/CS/hw.cs#1)] [!code-vb[console.bufferHW#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.bufferHW/VB/hw.vb#1)]

summary.span: 当 修改键 (Ctrl) 和 console 键 (C) 或 Break 键同时按住（Ctrl+C 或 Ctrl+Break）时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the modifier key (Ctrl) and either the console key (C) or the Break key are pressed simultaneously (Ctrl+C or Ctrl+Break).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 结合使用此事件和。This event is used in conjunction with and . 事件，控制台应用程序来截获 Ctrl + C 信号，以便事件处理程序可以决定是否要继续执行或终止。The event enables a console application to intercept the Ctrl+C signal so the event handler can decide whether to continue executing or terminate. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 当用户按 Ctrl + C 或 Ctrl + Break触发事件和应用程序的执行事件处理程序。When the user presses either Ctrl+C or Ctrl+Break, the event is fired and the application's event handler is executed. 事件处理程序传递具有两个有用的属性的对象：The event handler is passed a object that has two useful properties: - 可用于确定在处理程序的调用由于用户按 Ctrl + C (属性值是) 或 Ctrl + Break (属性值是)。, which allows you to determine whether the handler was invoked as a result of the user pressing Ctrl+C (the property value is ) or Ctrl+Break (the property value is ). - 可用于确定如何向应用程序应响应用户按 Ctrl + C 或 Ctrl + Break。, which allows you to determine how to your application should respond to the user pressing Ctrl+C or Ctrl+Break. 默认情况下属性是`false`，这会导致程序终止事件处理程序退出时的执行。By default, the property is `false`, which causes program execution to terminate when the event handler exits. 其属性更改为`true`指定应用程序应继续执行。Changing its property to `true` specifies that the application should continue to execute. > [!TIP] > 如果你的应用程序的要求很简单，则可以使用属性而不是此事件。If your application has simple requirements, you can use the property instead of this event. 通过将此属性设置为`false`，可以确保你的应用程序始终时在用户按 Ctrl + C 退出。By setting this property to `false`, you can ensure that your application always exits if the user presses Ctrl+C. 通过将其设置为`true`，可以确保按 Ctrl + C 将终止该应用程序。By setting it to `true`, you can ensure that pressing Ctrl+C will not terminate the application. 线程池线程上执行此事件的事件处理程序。The event handler for this event is executed on a thread pool thread. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将使用事件。The following example demonstrates how the event is used. 当您按 Ctrl + C 时，读取的操作被中断和`myHandler`调用事件处理程序。When you press Ctrl+C, the read operation is interrupted and the `myHandler` event handler is invoked. 事件处理程序，在输入时属性是`false`，这意味着，事件处理程序终止时，将终止当前进程。Upon entry to the event handler, the property is `false`, which means that the current process will terminate when the event handler terminates. 但是，事件处理程序设置属性设置为`true`，这意味着，将不会终止进程，并且读取的操作会继续。However, the event handler sets the property to `true`, which means that the process will not terminate and the read operation will resume. [!code-cpp[console.cancelkeypress#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.cancelkeypress/cpp/ckp.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[console.cancelkeypress#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.cancelkeypress/cs/ckp.cs#1)] [!code-vb[console.cancelkeypress#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.cancelkeypress/vb/ckp.vb#1)]

summary.span: 清除控制台缓冲区和相应的控制台窗口的显示信息。

span.span: Clears the console buffer and corresponding console window of display information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法在等效调用 MS-DOS`cls`命令在命令提示符窗口中。Using the method is equivalent invoking the MS-DOS `cls` command in the command prompt window. 当调用方法、 游标自动滚动到窗口的左上角和屏幕缓冲区的内容设置为使用当前前景色背景色的空格。When the method is called, the cursor automatically scrolls to the top-left corner of the window and the contents of the screen buffer are set to blanks using the current foreground background colors. > [!NOTE] > 尝试调用方法在控制台应用程序的输出定向到一个文件时将引发。Attempting to call the method when a console application's output is redirected to a file throws a . 若要防止此情况，始终包装调用中的方法`try`...`catch`To prevent this, always wrap a call to the method in a `try`…`catch` 块。block. ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法清除控制台，然后执行一个循环，提示用户选择前景色和背景颜色，并输入要显示的字符串。The following example uses the method to clear the console before it executes a loop, prompts the user to select a foreground and background color and to enter a string to display. 如果用户选择不退出程序，将还原该控制台的原始的前景色和背景颜色和重新执行循环之前再次调用方法。If the user chooses not to exit the program, the console's original foreground and background colors are restored and the method is called again before re-executing the loop. [!code-csharp[System.Console.Clear#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.clear/cs/clear1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Console.Clear#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.clear/vb/clear1.vb#1)] 示例依赖于`GetKeyPress`方法来验证用户的所选内容的前景色和背景颜色。The example relies on a `GetKeyPress` method to validate the user's selection of a foreground and background color. 此示例演示并属性，并和方法。This example demonstrates the and properties, and the and methods. 该示例定位光标，确定下一个写入将发生的位置由结合使用的 5 字符矩形绘制 5 个字符"+"、"|"，和"-"字符串。The example positions the cursor, which determines where the next write will occur, to draw a 5 character by 5 character rectangle using a combination of "+", "|", and "-" strings. 请注意，可以使用更少的步骤使用的其他字符串组合绘制矩形。Note that the rectangle could be drawn with fewer steps using a combination of other strings. [!code-cpp[console.cursorLTS#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.cursorLTS/CPP/lts.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[console.cursorLTS#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.cursorLTS/CS/lts.cs#1)] [!code-vb[console.cursorLTS#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.cursorLTS/VB/lts.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 光标外观将发生变化，当属性值为 1，当属性值为 100，则会填充该单元格范围从一条水平线的单元格的底部。The cursor appearance varies, ranging from a horizontal line at the bottom of the cell when the property value is 1, to completely filling the cell when the property value is 100. ## Examples 此示例演示属性。This example demonstrates the property. 该示例会增大的光标每次任何控制台键按下时，然后终止之前将游标还原到其原始大小的大小。The example increases the size of the cursor each time any console key is pressed, then restores the cursor to its original size before terminating. summary.span: 获取标准错误输出流。

span.span: Gets the standard error output stream.

value.span: 表示标准错误输出流的 。

span.span: A that represents the standard error output stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，此标准错误流设置到控制台。This standard error stream is set to the console by default. 可以将它设置为另一个流方法。It can be set to another stream with the method. 标准错误流重定向后，它可以重新获取通过调用方法。After the standard error stream is redirected, it can be reacquired by calling the method. 标准错误流中的信息性输出通常定向到一个文件的控制台应用程序，可通过属性可用于向控制台显示的信息，即使输出重定向。In console applications whose informational output is often redirected to a file, the standard error stream available through the property can be used to display information to the console even if output is redirected. 下面的示例从 1 开始的一次显示 10 个数字的产品表。The following example displays product tables for 10 numbers at a time starting with 1. 每个组的 10 个数字后属性用来询问用户是否显示下一组。After every set of 10 numbers, the property is used to ask the user whether to display the next set. 标准输出定向到一个文件，如果仍例程是否应生成产品的下一组要求用户。If the standard output is redirected to a file, the user is still asked whether the routine should generate the next set of products. [!code-csharp[System.Console.Error#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.error/cs/error1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Console.Error#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.error/vb/error1.vb#1)] ## Examples 下面的示例是名为 ExpandTabs 将在文本文件中的制表符替换为四个空格，定义的值的命令行实用工具`tabSize`变量。The following example is a command line utility named ExpandTabs that replaces tab characters in a text file with four spaces, the value defined by the `tabSize` variable. 它将重定向标准输入和输出流式传输到文件，但使用属性要将标准错误流写入到控制台。It redirects the standard input and output streams to files, but uses the property to write the standard error stream to the console. 通过提供包含选项卡上的字符的文件的名称和输出文件的名称，可以从命令行启动它。It can be launched from the command line by supplying the name of the file that contains tab characters and the name of the output file. [!code-cpp[Console-EXPANDTABSEX#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Console-EXPANDTABSEX/CPP/expandtabsex.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Console-EXPANDTABSEX#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Console-EXPANDTABSEX/CS/expandtabsex.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Console-EXPANDTABSEX#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Console-EXPANDTABSEX/VB/expandtabsex.vb#1)] 下面的示例是将一个或多个文本文件的内容显示在控制台的简单文本文件查看器。The following example is a simple text file viewer that displays the contents of one or more text files to the console. 如果没有任何命令行自变量，或如果不存在作为命令行参数传递的任何文件，该示例将调用方法来将错误的信息重定向到一个文件，调用方法过程中重新获取标准错误流，并指示错误的信息已写入到文件。If there are no command line arguments, or if any files passed as command line arguments do not exist, the example calls the method to redirect error information to a file, calls the method in the process of reacquiring the standard error stream, and indicates that error information was written to a file. [!code-csharp[System.Console.OpenStandardError#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.openstandarderror/cs/viewtextfile.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Console.OpenStandardError#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.openstandarderror/vb/viewtextfile.vb#1)] 请注意，属性设置为`true`之前重新获取错误流。Note that the property is set to `true` before reacquiring the error stream. 这可确保，输出将立即发送到控制台而不是缓冲。This ensures that output will be sent to the console immediately rather than buffered.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于基于 Windows 的应用程序，在其中一个控制台不存在，get 操作返回。A get operation for a Windows-based application, in which a console does not exist, returns . ## Examples 下面的示例检查是否在控制台的背景颜色为黑色，是否是，其背景色更改为红色和黑色到的前景色。The following example checks whether the console's background color is black and, if it is, it changes the background color to red and the foreground color to black. [!code-csharp[System.ConsoleColor#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.consolecolor/cs/Example2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.ConsoleColor#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.consolecolor/vb/Example2.vb#2)] 以下示例将保存的值到一个数组的枚举，并将存储的当前值和变量的属性。The following example saves the values of the enumeration to an array and stores the current values of the and properties to variables. 然后的前景色更改为在每个颜色枚举只匹配当前背景的颜色和背景色更改为在每个颜色除枚举到匹配的颜色当前前景色。It then changes the foreground color to each color in the enumeration except to the color that matches the current background, and it changes the background color to each color in the enumeration except to the color that matches the current foreground. （如果的前景色与背景色相同，文本不可见。）最后，调用方法还原原始的控制台颜色。(If the foreground color is the same as the background color, the text isn't visible.) Finally, it calls the method to restore the original console colors. remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，此属性设置为标准的输入流。This property is set to the standard input stream by default. 此属性可以设置为另一个流方法。This property can be set to another stream with the method. 标准输入流上的执行读取操作以同步方式执行。Read operations on the standard input stream execute synchronously. 也就是说，它们阻塞，直到指定的读取的操作完成。That is, they block until the specified read operation has completed. 这甚至适用如果异步方法，如，在调用对象返回的属性。This is true even if an asynchronous method, such as , is called on the object returned by the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用`In`属性。The following sample illustrates the use of the `In` property. summary.span: 获取或设置控制台用于读取输入的编码。

span.span: Gets or sets the encoding the console uses to read input.

value.span: 用于读取控制台输入的编码。

span.span: The encoding used to read console input.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制台使用要将键盘输入转换为相应的字符编码的输入。The console uses the input encoding to translate keyboard input into a corresponding character. 输入编码用到了映射到单个字符的 256 键盘字符代码的代码页。The input encoding incorporates a code page that maps 256 keyboard character codes to individual characters. 不同的代码页包含不同的特殊字符，通常会对一种语言或一组语言进行自定义。Different code pages include different special characters, typically customized for a language or a group of languages. 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，属性获取操作可能返回缓存的值而不是控制台的当前输入编码。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], a property get operation may return a cached value instead of the console's current input encoding. 发生这种情况的值属性修改通过某种方式而不是到赋值属性，例如调用 Windows`SetConsoleCP`函数或使用`chcp`命令从 PowerShell 脚本。This can occur if the value of the property is modified by some means other than an assignment to the property, such as calling the Windows `SetConsoleCP` function or using the `chcp` command from a PowerShell script.

span.span: Copies a specified source area of the screen buffer to a specified destination area.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果目标和源参数指定的位置位于当前屏幕缓冲区边界之外，则复制仅适合目标区域的源区域的部分。If the destination and source parameters specify a position located outside the boundaries of the current screen buffer, only the portion of the source area that fits within the destination area is copied. 也就是说，源区域进行剪裁以适应当前屏幕缓冲区的大小。That is, the source area is clipped to fit the current screen buffer. 方法将源区域复制到目标区域。The method copies the source area to the destination area. 如果目标区域不相交的源区域，以使用当前前景色和背景颜色的空白填充源区域。If the destination area does not intersect the source area, the source area is filled with blanks using the current foreground and background colors. 否则，将不填充源区域相交的部分。Otherwise, the intersected portion of the source area is not filled.

span.span: Copies a specified source area of the screen buffer to a specified destination area.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果目标和源参数指定的位置位于当前屏幕缓冲区边界之外，则复制仅适合目标区域的源区域的部分。If the destination and source parameters specify a position located beyond the boundaries of the current screen buffer, only the portion of the source area that fits within the destination area is copied. 也就是说，源区域进行剪裁以适应当前屏幕缓冲区的大小。That is, the source area is clipped to fit the current screen buffer. 方法将源区域复制到目标区域。The method copies the source area to the destination area. 如果目标区域不相交的源区域，使用指定的字符填充源区域`sourceChar`，使用指定的颜色`sourceForeColor`和`sourceBackColor`。If the destination area does not intersect the source area, the source area is filled with the character specified by `sourceChar`, using the colors specified by `sourceForeColor` and `sourceBackColor`. 否则，将不填充源区域相交的部分。Otherwise, the intersected portion of the source area is not filled. 方法会执行任何操作，如果`sourceWidth`或`sourceHeight`为零。The method performs no operation if `sourceWidth` or `sourceHeight` is zero.

The standard error stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可用于通过更改之后重新获取标准错误流方法。This method can be used to reacquire the standard error stream after it has been changed by the method. ## Examples 下面的示例是将一个或多个文本文件的内容显示在控制台的简单文本文件查看器。The following example is a simple text file viewer that displays the contents of one or more text files to the console. 如果没有任何命令行自变量，或如果不存在作为命令行参数传递的任何文件，该示例将调用方法来将错误的信息重定向到一个文件，调用方法过程中重新获取标准错误流，并指示错误的信息已写入到文件。If there are no command line arguments, or if any files passed as command line arguments do not exist, the example calls the method to redirect error information to a file, calls the method in the process of reacquiring the standard error stream, and indicates that error information was written to a file. [!code-csharp[System.Console.OpenStandardError#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.openstandarderror/cs/viewtextfile.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Console.OpenStandardError#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.openstandarderror/vb/viewtextfile.vb#1)] 请注意，属性设置为`true`之前重新获取错误流。Note that the property is set to `true` before reacquiring the error stream. 这可确保，输出将立即发送到控制台而不是缓冲。This ensures that output will be sent to the console immediately rather than buffered.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制台使用的输出编码到相应的控制台显示字符的应用程序写入的字符转换。The console uses the output encoding to translate characters written by an application into corresponding console display characters. 控制台使用的默认代码页取决于系统区域设置。The default code page that the console uses is determined by the system locale. 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，属性获取操作可能返回缓存的值而不是控制台的当前输出编码。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], a property get operation may return a cached value instead of the console's current output encoding. 发生这种情况的值属性修改通过某种方式而不是到赋值属性，例如调用 Windows`SetConsoleOutputCP`函数。This can occur if the value of the property is modified by some means other than an assignment to the property, such as calling the Windows `SetConsoleOutputCP` function.

summary.span: 从标准输入流读取下一个字符。

span.span: Reads the next character from the standard input stream.

span.span: The next character from the input stream, or negative one (-1) if there are currently no more characters to be read.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法进行阻止，它的返回用户键入的输入的字符时; 终止时按密钥。The method blocks its return while you type input characters; it terminates when you press the key. 按 Enter 将依赖于平台的行终止序列追加到输入 （例如，Windows 将追加一个回车符和换行符序列）。Pressing Enter appends a platform-dependent line termination sequence to your input (for example, Windows appends a carriage return-linefeed sequence). 对后续调用方法一次检索输入的一个字符。Subsequent calls to the method retrieve your input one character at a time. 检索最后一个字符后，阻止其返回再次和重复这一循环。After the final character is retrieved, blocks its return again and the cycle repeats. > [!IMPORTANT] > 方法，或属性和方法要优于使用方法。The method, or the property and method are preferable to using the method. 请注意该方法不会不返回-1，除非执行以下操作之一：Note that the method does not return -1 unless you perform one of the following actions: - 同时按修改键和控制台键 (Ctrl + Z)，指示文件尾条件。Simultaneously press the modifier key and console key (Ctrl+Z), which signals the end-of-file condition. - 按等效键，用于通知的文件结尾条件，例如在 Windows 中的 F6 函数密钥。Press an equivalent key that signals the end-of-file condition, such as the F6 function key in Windows. - 输入的流重定向到源，如文本文件，具有实际的文件尾字符。Redirect the input stream to a source, such as a text file, that has an actual end-of-file character. ## Examples 下面的示例演示方法。The following example demonstrates the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法，即等待对线程发出的阻止方法，直到按下字符或功能键。The method waits, that is, blocks on the thread issuing the method, until a character or function key is pressed. 字符或函数可以是按下某个键组合使用一个或多个 Alt、 Ctrl 或 Shift 修改键。A character or function key can be pressed in combination with one or more Alt, Ctrl, or Shift modifier keys. 但是，按修改键本身不会导致方法返回。However, pressing a modifier key by itself will not cause the method to return. 具体取决于您的应用程序，你可能想要使用方法结合属性。Depending on your application, you might want to use the method in conjunction with the property. 即使标准输入重定向到一个文件方法从键盘读取方法。The method reads from the keyboard even if the standard input is redirected to a file with the method. ## Examples 最常见的一个用途的方法是停止程序执行，直到用户按下某个键和应用程序终止或显示信息的其他窗口。One of the most common uses of the method is to halt program execution until the user presses a key and the app either terminates or displays an additional window of information. 下面的示例使用方法以等待用户按 Enter 键终止应用程序之前。The following example uses the method to wait for the user to press the Enter key before terminating the app. [!code-csharp[System.Console.ReadKey#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Console.ReadKey/cs/ReadKey1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Console.ReadKey#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Console.ReadKey/vb/ReadKey1.vb#1)] 请注意，这一重载方法默认情况下将回显到控制台用户按下任何可显示密钥。Note that this overload of the method by default echoes any displayable keys that the user presses to the console. 若要取消它们，请调用方法替换`intercept`自变量的`true`。To suppress them, call the method with an `intercept` argument of `true`. 下面的示例使用方法来显示用户按下哪个密钥有关的信息。The following example uses the method to display information about which key the user pressed. [!code-cpp[console.readkey1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.readkey1/CPP/rk.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[console.readkey1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.readkey1/CS/rk.cs#1)] [!code-vb[console.readkey1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.readkey1/VB/rk.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法，即等待对线程发出的阻止方法，直到按下字符或功能键。The method waits, that is, blocks on the thread issuing the method, until a character or function key is pressed. 字符或函数可以是按下某个键组合使用一个或多个 Alt、 Ctrl 或 Shift 修改键。A character or function key can be pressed in combination with one or more Alt, Ctrl, or Shift modifier keys. 但是，按修改键本身不会导致方法返回。However, pressing a modifier key by itself will not cause the method to return. 如果`intercept`参数是`true`、 按下的键被截取，而且不显示在控制台窗口中; 否则为将显示按下的键。If the `intercept` parameter is `true`, the pressed key is intercepted and not displayed in the console window; otherwise, the pressed key is displayed. 具体取决于您的应用程序，你可能想要使用方法结合属性。Depending on your application, you might want to use the method in conjunction with the property. 即使标准输入重定向到一个文件方法从键盘读取方法。The method reads from the keyboard even if the standard input is redirected to a file with the method. ## Examples 最常见的一个用途的方法是停止程序执行，直到用户按下某个键和应用程序终止或显示信息的其他窗口。One of the most common uses of the method is to halt program execution until the user presses a key and the app either terminates or displays an additional window of information. 下面的示例使用方法以等待用户按 Enter 键终止应用程序之前。The following example uses the method to wait for the user to press the Enter key before terminating the app. 请注意，是否用户按任意键，它不回显到控制台。Note that, if the user presses any other key, it is not echoed to the console. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法从标准输入流中读取一行。The method reads a line from the standard input stream. （有关行的定义，请参阅段落后下面的列表。）这表示：(For the definition of a line, see the paragraph after the following list.) This means that: - 如果标准的输入的设备是键盘方法进行阻止，直到用户按下**Enter**密钥。If the standard input device is the keyboard, the method blocks until the user presses the **Enter** key. 最常见的一个用途的方法是以暂停程序执行前清除控制台并显示新的信息，或提示用户按 Enter 键终止应用程序之前。One of the most common uses of the method is to pause program execution before clearing the console and displaying new information to it, or to prompt the user to press the Enter key before terminating the application. 下面的示例阐释了这一点。The following example illustrates this. [!code-cpp[System.Console.ReadLine#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Console.ReadLine/cpp/ReadLineSimple.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[System.Console.ReadLine#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Console.ReadLine/cs/ReadLineSimple.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Console.ReadLine#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Console.ReadLine/vb/ReadLineSimple.vb#6)] - 标准输入重定向到一个文件，如果方法从文件读取文本行。If standard input is redirected to a file, the method reads a line of text from a file. 例如，下面是一个名为 ReadLine1.txt 文本文件：For example, the following is a text file named ReadLine1.txt: ``` This is the first line. This is the second line. This is the third line. This is the fourth line. ``` 下面的示例使用方法来读取输入从文件将重定向。The following example uses the method to read input that is redirected from a file. 读取的操作将终止该方法返回时`null`，这指示没有行仍可供读取。The read operation terminates when the method returns `null`, which indicates that no lines remain to be read. [!code-csharp[System.Console.ReadLine#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Console.ReadLine/cs/ReadLine3.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Console.ReadLine#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Console.ReadLine/vb/ReadLine3.vb#3)] 编译后到可执行文件的命名 ReadLine1.exe 示例，您可以运行它从命令行语法After compiling the example to an executable named ReadLine1.exe, you can run it from the command line with the syntax ``` ReadLine1 < ReadLine1.txt ``` 若要读取该文件的内容并将其显示到控制台。to read the contents of the file and display them to the console. 将行定义为一系列字符后跟回车符 (十六进制 0x000d)、 换行符 (十六进制 0x000a) 或的值属性。A line is defined as a sequence of characters followed by a carriage return (hexadecimal 0x000d), a line feed (hexadecimal 0x000a), or the value of the property. 返回的字符串不包含终止字符。The returned string does not contain the terminating character(s). 默认情况下，该方法读取输入从 256 个字符输入缓冲区。By default, the method reads input from a 256-character input buffer. 这包括由于字符，该方法可以读取包含最多为 254 个字符的行。Because this includes the character(s), the method can read lines that contain up to 254 characters. 若要阅读较长的行，调用方法。To read longer lines, call the method. 方法以同步方式执行。The method executes synchronously. 即，被阻止，直至读取行或按下 Ctrl + Z 键盘组合。That is, it blocks until a line is read or the Ctrl+Z keyboard combination is pressed. 属性返回对象，表示标准输入的流并具有两个同步方法和异步方法。The property returns a object that represents the standard input stream and that has both a synchronous method and an asynchronous method. 但是，当用作控制台的标准输入流同步而不是以异步方式执行，并返回`Task`仅读取的操作完成后。However, when used as the console's standard input stream, the executes synchronously rather than asynchronously and returns a `Task` only after the read operation has completed. 如果此方法将引发异常，在基础读取器的位置对象的字符的方法是可以读取，但到内部已读取的字符数高级缓冲区是被丢弃。If this method throws an exception, the reader's position in the underlying object is advanced by the number of characters the method was able to read, but the characters already read into the internal buffer are discarded. 由于不能更改流中读取器的位置，因此已读取的字符是不可恢复，并且可以仅通过重新初始化访问。Since the position of the reader in the stream cannot be changed, the characters already read are unrecoverable, and can be accessed only by reinitializing the . 如果流中的初始位置未知或该流不支持查找，基础还需要重新初始化。If the initial position within the stream is unknown or the stream does not support seeking, the underlying also needs to be reinitialized. 若要避免这种情况并生成可靠的代码，应使用属性和读取方法和应用商店中预先分配的缓冲区的字符。To avoid such a situation and to produce robust code, you should use the property and method and store the read characters in a pre-allocated buffer. 如果当方法为从控制台读取输入按下 Ctrl + Z 字符，该方法返回`null`。If the Ctrl+Z character is pressed when the method is reading input from the console, the method returns `null`. 这使用户以防止进一步的键盘输入时在循环中调用方法。This enables the user to prevent further keyboard input when the method is called in a loop. 下面的示例演示了此方案。The following example illustrates this scenario. [!code-cpp[System.Console.ReadLine#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Console.ReadLine/cpp/readline2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Console.ReadLine#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Console.ReadLine/cs/ReadLine2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Console.ReadLine#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Console.ReadLine/vb/ReadLine2.vb#1)] ## Examples 下面的示例需要两个命令行参数： 现有文本文件的名称和要写入到输出文件的名称。The following example requires two command line arguments: the name of an existing text file, and the name of a file to write the output to. 打开现有的文本文件，并将重定向到该文件的标准键盘输入。It opens the existing text file and redirects the standard input from the keyboard to that file. 它还将重定向到输出文件的标准控制台输出。It also redirects the standard output from the console to the output file. 然后，它使用方法来读取该文件中的每一行，每个序列的四个空格替换制表符，并使用方法将结果写入输出文件。It then uses the method to read each line in the file, replaces every sequence of four spaces with a tab character, and uses the method to write the result to the output file. [!code-cpp[System.Console-INSERTTABS#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Console-INSERTTABS/CPP/inserttabs.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Console-INSERTTABS#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Console-INSERTTABS/CS/inserttabs.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Console-INSERTTABS#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Console-INSERTTABS/VB/inserttabs.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 前景色和背景颜色会还原到当前进程开始时存在的颜色。The foreground and background colors are restored to the colors that existed when the current process began. 有关详细信息，请参阅和属性。For more information, see the and properties. ## Examples 以下示例将保存的值到一个数组的枚举，并将存储的当前值和变量的属性。The following example saves the values of the enumeration to an array and stores the current values of the and properties to variables. 然后的前景色更改为在每个颜色枚举只匹配当前背景的颜色和背景色更改为在每个颜色除枚举到匹配的颜色当前前景色。It then changes the foreground color to each color in the enumeration except to the color that matches the current background, and it changes the background color to each color in the enumeration except to the color that matches the current foreground. （如果的前景色与背景色相同，文本不可见。）最后，调用方法还原原始的控制台颜色。(If the foreground color is the same as the background color, the text isn't visible.) Finally, it calls the method to restore the original console colors. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法来指定下一个写入操作在控制台窗口中的开始位置。Use the method to specify where the next write operation in the console window is to begin. 如果指定的游标位置是在控制台窗口中当前可见区域外，窗口原点将自动更改以使游标可见。If the specified cursor position is outside the area that is currently visible in the console window, the window origin changes automatically to make the cursor visible. 光标自动移动到下一个字符位置每次一个字符写入到控制台窗口。The cursor automatically moves to the next character position each time a character is written to the console window. 如果游标是在控制台窗口的底部右侧字符位置的下一个写入操作将导致在控制台窗口滚动，以使游标将保持可见。If the cursor is at the bottom right character position of the console window, the next write operation causes the console window to scroll so the cursor remains visible. 如果你想要字符写入而不会导致向下滚动，请使用在控制台窗口的底部右侧的字符位置方法移动到该位置的字符。If you want to write a character to the bottom right character position without causing the console window to scroll, use the method to move a character to that position. ## Examples 此示例演示并属性，并和方法。This example demonstrates the and properties, and the and methods. 该示例定位光标，确定下一个写入将发生的位置由结合使用的 5 字符矩形绘制 5 个字符"+"、"|"，和"-"字符串。The example positions the cursor, which determines where the next write will occur, to draw a 5 character by 5 character rectangle using a combination of "+", "|", and "-" strings. 请注意，可以使用更少的步骤使用的其他字符串组合绘制矩形。Note that the rectangle could be drawn with fewer steps using a combination of other strings. remarks.format: ## Remarks 操作系统窗口显示控制台窗口中，并在控制台窗口显示屏幕缓冲区的一部分。The operating system window displays the console window, and the console window displays a portion of the screen buffer. 方法影响的位置的控制台窗口相对于屏幕缓冲区中，但不会影响操作系统窗口相对于桌面的位置。The method affects the position of the console window relative to the screen buffer, but does not affect the position of the operating system window relative to the desktop. 控制台和操作系统 windows 通常不会影响彼此。The console and operating system windows generally do not affect each other. 但是，如果屏幕缓冲区不能显示在控制台窗口的当前边界，操作系统会自动添加滚动条操作系统窗口中。However, if the screen buffer cannot be displayed in the current boundaries of the console window, the operating system automatically appends scroll bars to the operating system window. 在这种情况下，移动操作系统窗口滚动栏影响的控制台窗口中，位置和移动控制台窗口与方法影响的操作系统窗口滚动条的位置。In that case, moving the operating system window scroll bars affects the position of the console window, and moving the console window with the method affects the position of the operating system window scroll bars. ## Examples 下面的示例演示， ， ， ， ， ，以及属性，并， ，和方法。The following example demonstrates the , , , , , , and properties; and the , , and methods. 该示例基于屏幕缓冲区的宽度屏幕缓冲区中绘制网格模式。The example draws a grid pattern in the screen buffer based on the screen buffer width. 然后该示例将移到的向上箭头，向下箭头、 向左键或向右箭头控制台键按下的响应中的控制台窗口。Then the example moves the console window in response to which of the UP ARROW, DOWN ARROW, LEFT ARROW, or RIGHT ARROW console keys is pressed. 网格模式有助于您查看控制台窗口相对于屏幕缓冲区的移动。The grid pattern helps you see the movement of the console window relative to the screen buffer. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是将修改键 和控制台键 的组合 (Ctrl+C) 视为普通输入，还是视为由操作系统处理的中断。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the combination of the modifier key and console key (Ctrl+C) is treated as ordinary input or as an interruption that is handled by the operating system.

value.span: 如果将 Ctrl+C 视为普通输入，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if Ctrl+C is treated as ordinary input; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果的值属性是`false`和按下 Ctrl + C、 按下的键不会存储在输入缓冲区和操作系统终止当前正在执行的进程。If the value of the property is `false` and Ctrl+C is pressed, the pressed keys are not stored in the input buffer and the operating system terminates the currently executing process. 这是默认值。This is the default value. > [!CAUTION] > 请谨慎使用此属性，因为将其设置为`true`具有如此显著的影响。Use this property judiciously because setting it to `true` has such a dramatic effect. 大多数用户都希望 Ctrl + C 来终止一个控制台应用程序。Most users expect Ctrl+C to terminate a console application. 如果禁用 Ctrl + C 的效果，用户必须记住，使用 Ctrl + Break 终止应用程序，这是不太常见的键组合。If you disable the effect of Ctrl+C, the user must remember to use Ctrl+Break to terminate the application, which is a less familiar key combination. ## Examples 下面的示例演示属性。The following example demonstrates the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在控制台到更大的矩形缓冲区区域表示的矩形窗口。The console represents a rectangular window into a larger rectangular buffer area. 通过它们的行数和水平方向由其数量的列在窗口和缓冲区的测量垂直。Both the window and the buffer are measured vertically by their number of rows and horizontally by their number of columns. 通过定义缓冲区的维度和属性。The dimensions of the buffer area are defined by the and properties. 由定义控制台区域的尺寸和属性。The dimensions of the console area are defined by the and properties. 属性确定缓冲区的哪些列显示在控制台窗口的第一列中。The property determines which column of the buffer area is displayed in the first column of the console window. 值属性可以介于 0 到 - 。The value of the property can range from 0 to - . 尝试将其设置为的值超出该范围，则会引发。Attempting to set it to a value outside that range throws an . 控制台窗口首次打开时，默认值的属性为零，指示控制台显示的第一列对应于在缓冲区中的第一个列 （位置 0 处的列）。When a console window first opens, the default value of the property is zero, which indicates that the first column shown by the console corresponds to the first column (the column at position zero) in the buffer area. 在控制台窗口和缓冲区的默认宽度为 80 的列。The default width of both the console window and the buffer area is 80 columns. 这意味着，控制台窗口变窄或缓冲区变宽，才可以修改属性。This means that the property can be modified only if the console window is made narrower or the buffer area is made wider. 请注意，如果缓冲区的宽度超过了的控制台窗口中，值的宽度自动进行调整属性，当用户使用水平滚动条以与缓冲区区域定义窗口的关系。Note that if the width of the buffer area exceeds the width of the console window, the value of the property is automatically adjusted when the user uses the horizontal scroll bar to define the window's relationship to the buffer area. 尝试设置的值属性时输出重定向，则会引发异常。Attempting to set the value of the property when output is redirected throws an exception. 若要避免此异常，可以设置此属性仅当值属性返回`false`。To prevent the exception, you can set the value of this property only if the property returns `false`. ## Examples 以下示例打开一个 80 列控制台窗口中，并定义 120 列宽的缓冲区区域。The following example opens an 80-column console window and defines a buffer area that is 120 columns wide. 它显示窗口和缓冲区大小的相关信息，然后等待用户按向左键或向右箭头键。It displays information on window and buffer size, and then waits for the user to press either the LEFT ARROW key or the RIGHT ARROW key. 在前一种情况，它递减的值1 如果结果为的合法值的属性。In the former case, it decrements the value of the property by one if the result is a legal value. 在后一种情况下，它会增加的值1 如果结果是合法的属性。In the latter case, it increases the value of the property by one if the result would be legal. 请注意，该示例不需要处理，因为它会检查的值分配给属性不为负且不会导致的总和并属性超过属性值。Note that the example does not have to handle an , because it checks that the value to be assigned to the property is not negative and does not cause the sum of the and properties to exceed the property value. [!code-cpp[System.Console.WindowLeft#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.windowleft/cpp/windowleft1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Console.WindowLeft#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.windowleft/cs/windowleft1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Console.WindowLeft#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.windowleft/vb/windowleft1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置控制台窗口区域的最顶部相对于屏幕缓冲区的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the top position of the console window area relative to the screen buffer.

value.span: 控制台窗口最顶部的位置，以行为单位。

span.span: The uppermost console window position measured in rows.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在控制台到更大的矩形缓冲区区域表示的矩形窗口。The console represents a rectangular window into a larger rectangular buffer area. 通过它们的行数和水平方向由其数量的列在窗口和缓冲区的测量垂直。Both the window and the buffer are measured vertically by their number of rows and horizontally by their number of columns. 通过定义缓冲区的维度和属性。The dimensions of the buffer area are defined by the and properties. 由定义控制台区域的尺寸和属性。The dimensions of the console area are defined by the and properties. 属性确定缓冲区的行显示在控制台窗口的第一列。The property determines which row of the buffer area is displayed in the first column of the console window. 值属性可以介于 0 到 - 。The value of the property can range from 0 to - . 尝试将其设置为的值超出该范围，则会引发。Attempting to set it to a value outside that range throws an . 尝试设置的值属性时输出重定向，则会引发异常。Attempting to set the value of the property when output is redirected throws an exception. 若要避免此异常，可以设置此属性仅当值属性返回`false`。To prevent the exception, you can set the value of this property only if the property returns `false`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示， ， ， ， ， ，以及属性，并， ，和方法。The following example demonstrates the , , , , , , and properties; and the , , and methods. 该示例基于屏幕缓冲区的宽度屏幕缓冲区中绘制网格模式。The example draws a grid pattern in the screen buffer based on the screen buffer width. 然后该示例将移到的向上箭头，向下箭头、 向左键或向右箭头控制台键按下的响应中的控制台窗口。Then the example moves the console window in response to which of the UP ARROW, DOWN ARROW, LEFT ARROW, or RIGHT ARROW console keys is pressed. 网格模式有助于您查看控制台窗口相对于屏幕缓冲区的移动。The grid pattern helps you see the movement of the console window relative to the screen buffer. [!code-cpp[console.windowLT#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.windowLT/CPP/wlt.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[console.windowLT#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.windowLT/CS/wlt.cs#1)] [!code-vb[console.windowLT#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.windowLT/VB/wlt.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置控制台窗口的宽度。

span.span: Gets or sets the width of the console window.

value.span: 控制台窗口的宽度，以列为单位。

span.span: The width of the console window measured in columns.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尝试设置的值属性重定向输出时将引发任一或异常。Attempting to set the value of the property when output is redirected throws either an or an exception. 若要防止出现异常，可以设置此属性仅当值属性返回`false`。To prevent an exception, you can set the value of this property only if the property returns `false`. ## Examples 此示例演示方法，并和属性。This example demonstrates the method, and the and properties. 必须运行该示例才能查看更改控制台窗口大小的完整的效果。You must run the example to see the full effect of changing the console window size. 该示例报告将设置为 85 列和 43 行的控制台窗口的维度，然后等待按键。The example reports the dimensions of a console window set to 85 columns and 43 rows, then waits for a key press. 按下任何键时，控制台窗口的尺寸缩减了一半，报告中的新维度，和示例等待另一个按键。When any key is pressed, the dimensions of the console window are halved, the new dimensions are reported, and the example waits for another key press. 最后，按任何键时控制台窗口还原到其原始维度和该示例将终止。Finally, when any key is pressed the console window is restored to its original dimensions and the example terminates. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使用[复合格式设置功能](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md)的.NET Framework，才能将对象的值转换为其文本表示形式，在字符串中嵌入该表示形式。This method uses the [composite formatting feature](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md) of the .NET Framework to convert the value of an object to its text representation and embed that representation in a string. 生成的字符串写入输出流。The resulting string is written to the output stream. `format`参数由零个或多个文本序列与零个或多个索引占位符称为格式项，对应于此方法的参数列表中的对象。The `format` parameter consists of zero or more runs of text intermixed with zero or more indexed placeholders, called format items, that correspond to an object in the parameter list of this method. 格式设置过程将每个格式项替换相应的对象的值的文本表示形式。The formatting process replaces each format item with the text representation of the value of the corresponding object. 格式项的语法是`{`*索引*[`,`*对齐*] [`:`*formatString*]`}`，它指定强制索引、 可选长度和格式的文本的对齐方式和可选的格式说明符字符用于控制如何设置相应的对象的值的格式字符串。The syntax of a format item is `{`*index*[`,`*alignment*][`:`*formatString*]`}`, which specifies a mandatory index, the optional length and alignment of the formatted text, and an optional string of format specifier characters that govern how the value of the corresponding object is formatted. .NET Framework 提供了广泛的格式设置支持，其格式设置的以下主题中更详细地介绍。The .NET Framework provides extensive formatting support, which is described in greater detail in the following formatting topics. - 有关复合格式设置功能，如支持方法的详细信息， ，和的某些重载，请参阅[复合格式设置](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md)。For more information about the composite formatting feature supported by methods such as , , and some overloads of , see [Composite Formatting](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md). - 有关数字格式说明符的详细信息，请参阅[标准数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md)并[自定义数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md)。For more information about numeric format specifiers, see [Standard Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md) and [Custom Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md). - 有关日期和时间格式说明符的详细信息，请参阅[标准日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)并[自定义日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)。For more information about date and time format specifiers, see [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md). - 有关枚举格式说明符的详细信息，请参阅[枚举格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/enumeration-format-strings.md)。For more information about enumeration format specifiers, see [Enumeration Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/enumeration-format-strings.md). - 有关格式设置的详细信息，请参阅[格式设置类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information about formatting, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). ## Examples 下面的示例使用 `WriteLine` 方法演示数字、日期和枚举的标准格式说明符。The following example uses the `WriteLine` method to demonstrate the standard formatting specifiers for numbers, dates, and enumerations. [!code-cpp[console.writelineFmt1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.writelineFmt1/cpp/wl.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[console.writelineFmt1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.writelineFmt1/cs/wl.cs#1)] [!code-vb[console.writelineFmt1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.writelineFmt1/vb/wl.vb#1)] 下面的示例演示 方法的用法。The following example illustrates the use of the method. [!code-cpp[System.Console-REFORMAT#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Console-REFORMAT/CPP/reformat.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Console-REFORMAT#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Console-REFORMAT/CS/reformat.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Console-REFORMAT#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Console-REFORMAT/VB/reformat.vb#1)]

有关复合格式设置功能，如支持方法的详细信息， ，和的某些重载，请参阅[复合格式设置](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md)。For more information about the composite formatting feature supported by methods such as , , and some overloads of , see [Composite Formatting](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md). - 有关数字格式说明符的详细信息，请参阅[标准数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md)并[自定义数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md)。For more information about numeric format specifiers, see [Standard Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md) and [Custom Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md). - 有关日期和时间格式说明符的详细信息，请参阅[标准日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)并[自定义日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)。For more information about date and time format specifiers, see [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md). - 有关枚举格式说明符的详细信息，请参阅[枚举格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/enumeration-format-strings.md)。For more information about enumeration format specifiers, see [Enumeration Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/enumeration-format-strings.md). - 有关格式设置的详细信息，请参阅[格式设置类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information about formatting, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). `arg`参数是参数数组。The `arg` parameter is a parameter array. 作为一个数组或五个或多个项的列表可以传递给方法参数。Arguments can be passed to the method either as an array or as list of five or more items. 示例演示了两种形式的方法调用。The examples illustrate both forms of method call. ## Examples 下面的示例定义`Person`具有多个属性提供有关个人信息的类。The following example defines a `Person` class with a number of properties that provide information about a person. 其`GetDescription`方法返回一个数组，其中包含所有之外的属性值。Its `GetDescription` method returns an array that contains all of the property values except one. 该示例然后使用返回的数组`GetDescription`方法来显示 Person 对象的值。The example then uses the array returned by the `GetDescription` method to display the values of the Person object. [!code-csharp[System.Console.Write#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.write/cs/WriteParams1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Console.Write#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.write/vb/WriteParams1.vb#1)] 请注意，该示例将调用方法而非方法因为它尝试显示的值`Person.Remarks`同一行上的属性。Note that the example calls the method rather than the method because it attempts to display the value of the `Person.Remarks` property on the same line. 若要执行此操作，它将检查的值和属性，以确定是否有足够的空间用于以适合的批注。To do this, it examines the value of the and properties to determine whether there is enough space for the remark to fit. 如果没有，它显示的行。If there is, it displays the line. 如果没有，它将写入一个行，缩进三个空格，并显示备注。If not, it writes a line, indents three spaces, and displays the remark. 下面的示例等同于第一个，不同之处在于它会提供五个项列表作为`arg`参数而不是参数数组。The following example is identical to the first, except that it supplies a five-item list as the `arg` argument instead of a parameter array. summary.span: 使用指定的格式信息将指定的对象和可变长度参数列表的文本表示形式写入标准输出流。

span.span: Writes the text representation of the specified objects and variable-length parameter list to the standard output stream using the specified format information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 此 API 不兼容 CLS。This API is not CLS-compliant. 符合 CLS 的替代方法是 。The CLS-compliant alternative is . C# 和 Visual Basic 编译器会自动解决调用此方法与调用。The C# and Visual Basic compilers automatically resolve a call to this method as a call to . 此方法使用[复合格式设置功能](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md)的.NET Framework，才能将对象的值转换为其文本表示形式，在字符串中嵌入该表示形式。This method uses the [composite formatting feature](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md) of the .NET Framework to convert the value of an object to its text representation and embed that representation in a string. 生成的字符串写入输出流。The resulting string is written to the output stream. `format`参数由零个或多个文本序列与零个或多个索引占位符称为格式项，对应于此方法的参数列表中的对象。The `format` parameter consists of zero or more runs of text intermixed with zero or more indexed placeholders, called format items, that correspond to an object in the parameter list of this method. 格式设置过程将每个格式项替换相应的对象的值的文本表示形式。The formatting process replaces each format item with the text representation of the value of the corresponding object. 格式项的语法是`{`*索引*[`,`*对齐*] [`:`*formatString*]`}`，它指定强制索引、 可选长度和格式的文本的对齐方式和可选的格式说明符字符用于控制如何设置相应的对象的值的格式字符串。The syntax of a format item is `{`*index*[`,`*alignment*][`:`*formatString*]`}`, which specifies a mandatory index, the optional length and alignment of the formatted text, and an optional string of format specifier characters that govern how the value of the corresponding object is formatted. .NET Framework 提供了广泛的格式设置支持，其格式设置的以下主题中更详细地介绍。The .NET Framework provides extensive formatting support, which is described in greater detail in the following formatting topics. - 有关复合格式设置功能，如支持方法的详细信息， ，和的某些重载，请参阅[复合格式设置](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md)。For more information about the composite formatting feature supported by methods such as , , and some overloads of , see [Composite Formatting](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md). - 有关数字格式说明符的详细信息，请参阅[标准数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md)并[自定义数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md)。For more information about numeric format specifiers, see [Standard Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md) and [Custom Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md). - 有关日期和时间格式说明符的详细信息，请参阅[标准日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)并[自定义日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)。For more information about date and time format specifiers, see [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md). - 有关枚举格式说明符的详细信息，请参阅[枚举格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/enumeration-format-strings.md)。For more information about enumeration format specifiers, see [Enumeration Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/enumeration-format-strings.md). - 有关格式设置的详细信息，请参阅[格式设置类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information about formatting, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用变量参数使用方法。The following example illustrates the use of variable parameters with the method. 使用复合格式字符串和五个格式项调用该方法。The method is called with a composite format string and five format items. [!code-cpp[System.Console.Write#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.console.write/cpp/con_write.cpp#3)]

span.span: Writes the text representation of the specified object, followed by the current line terminator, to the standard output stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `value` 为 `null`，则只写入行终止符。If `value` is `null`, only the line terminator is written. 否则为`ToString`方法的`value`调用以生成其字符串表示形式，并且生成的字符串写入到标准输出流。Otherwise, the `ToString` method of `value` is called to produce its string representation, and the resulting string is written to the standard output stream. 有关行终止符的详细信息，请参阅备注部分的不带参数的方法。For more information about the line terminator, see the Remarks section of the method that takes no parameters. ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法来显示到控制台对象数组中的每个值。The following example uses the method to display each value in an object array to the console. span.span: Writes the text representation of the specified object, followed by the current line terminator, to the standard output stream using the specified format information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使用[复合格式设置功能](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md)的.NET Framework，才能将对象的值转换为其文本表示形式，在字符串中嵌入该表示形式。This method uses the [composite formatting feature](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md) of the .NET Framework to convert the value of an object to its text representation and embed that representation in a string. 生成的字符串写入输出流。The resulting string is written to the output stream. `format`参数由零个或多个文本序列与零个或多个索引占位符称为格式项，对应于此方法的参数列表中的对象。The `format` parameter consists of zero or more runs of text intermixed with zero or more indexed placeholders, called format items, that correspond to an object in the parameter list of this method. 格式设置过程将每个格式项替换相应的对象的值的文本表示形式。The formatting process replaces each format item with the text representation of the value of the corresponding object. 格式项的语法是`{`*索引*[`,`*对齐*] [`:`*formatString*]`}`，它指定强制索引、 可选长度和格式的文本的对齐方式和可选的格式说明符字符用于控制如何设置相应的对象的值的格式字符串。The syntax of a format item is `{`*index*[`,`*alignment*][`:`*formatString*]`}`, which specifies a mandatory index, the optional length and alignment of the formatted text, and an optional string of format specifier characters that govern how the value of the corresponding object is formatted. .NET Framework 提供了广泛的格式设置支持，其格式设置的以下主题中更详细地介绍。The .NET Framework provides extensive formatting support, which is described in greater detail in the following formatting topics. - 有关复合格式设置功能，如支持方法的详细信息， ，和的某些重载，请参阅[复合格式设置](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md)。For more information about the composite formatting feature supported by methods such as , , and some overloads of , see [Composite Formatting](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md). - 有关数字格式说明符的详细信息，请参阅[标准数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md)并[自定义数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md)。For more information about numeric format specifiers, see [Standard Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md) and [Custom Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md). - 有关日期和时间格式说明符的详细信息，请参阅[标准日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)并[自定义日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)。For more information about date and time format specifiers, see [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md). - 有关枚举格式说明符的详细信息，请参阅[枚举格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/enumeration-format-strings.md)。For more information about enumeration format specifiers, see [Enumeration Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/enumeration-format-strings.md). - 有关格式设置的详细信息，请参阅[格式设置类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information about formatting, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). 有关行终止符的详细信息，请参阅备注部分的不带参数的方法。For more information about the line terminator, see the Remarks section of the method that takes no parameters. ## Examples 下面的示例调用方法来显示五个随机生成的值。The following example calls the method to display five randomly generated values. [!code-csharp[System.Console.WriteLine#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Console.WriteLine/CS/WriteLine6.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Console.WriteLine#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Console.WriteLine/VB/WriteLine6.vb#6)] 下面的示例调用方法来显示当前日期。The following example calls the method to display the current date. 请注意，格式项中`format`参数使用"D"[标准日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)中的当前区域性的长日期格式显示日期。Note that the format item in the `format` argument uses the "D" [standard date and time format string](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md) to display the date in the long date format of the current culture. [!code-csharp[System.Console.WriteLine#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Console.WriteLine/CS/WriteLine7.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Console.WriteLine#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Console.WriteLine/VB/WriteLine7.vb#7)]
